tool.name: hicCorrectMatrix
tool.description: Runs Dekker's iterative correction over a hic matrix.
tool.command:
ln -s $matrix temp_matrix.npz &&
hicCorrectMatrix
--matrix temp_matrix.npz
## special: --chromosomes is optional, but if given needs at least one argument #set chroms = '" "'.join([ str($var.chromosome) for $var in $chromosomes ]) #if chroms --chromosomes "$chroms" #end if
#if $mode.mode_selector == 'correct': --iterNum $mode.iterNum --outFileName corrected_matrix.npz
#if $mode.filterThreshold_low and $mode.filterThreshold_large: --filterThreshold $mode.filterThreshold_low $mode.filterThreshold_large #end if
#if $mode.inflationCutoff: --inflationCutoff $mode.inflationCutoff #end if
#if $mode.transCutoff: --transCutoff $mode.transCutoff #end if
#if $mode.sequencedCountCutoff: --sequencedCountCutoff $mode.sequencedCountCutoff #end if
$mode.skipDiagonal $mode.perchr #else: --plotName diagnostic_plot.png #if $mode.xMax: --xMax $mode.xMax #end if #end if

param.name: xMax
param.label: Max value for the x-axis in counts per bin

param.name: inflationCutoff
param.label: Inflation cutoff
param.help: Value corresponding to the maximum number of times a bin can be scaled up during the iterative correction. For example, a inflationCutoff of 3 will filter out all bins that were expanded 3 times or more during the iterative correction.

param.name: transCutoff
param.label: Trans region cutoff
param.help: Clip high counts in the top -transcut trans regions (i.e. between chromosomes). A usual value is 0.05.

param.name: sequencedCountCutoff
param.label: Sequenced count cutoff
param.help: Each bin receives a value indicating the fraction that is covered by reads. A cutoff of 0.5 will discard all those bins that have less than half of the bin covered.

param.name: filterThreshold_low
param.label: Remove bins of low coverage
param.help: e.g. -1.5; Both Thresholds needs to be set to take effect.

param.name: filterThreshold_large
param.label: Remove bins of large coverage
param.help: e.g. 5; Both Thresholds needs to be set to take effect.

repeat.name: chromosomes
repeat.title: Include chromosomes
repeat.help: List of chromosomes to be included in the iterative correction. The order of the given chromosomes will be kept for the resulting corrected matrix

tool.help:
**What it does**
Runs Dekker's iterative correction over a hic matrix.
